pkgmetadata.longdescription: rawfiles extension README=========================Copy raw files, like a CNAME.Setting=======.. You can see available package at `PyPI <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/sphinxcontrib-rawfiles>`_.You can get archive file at http://bitbucket.org/birkenfeld/sphinx-contrib/Install-------:: > easy_install sphinxcontrib-rawfilesConfigure Sphinx----------------To enable this extension, add ``sphinxcontrib.rawfiles`` module to extensionsoption at `conf.py` and add .:: import os, sys # Path to the folder where rawfiles.py is # NOTE: not needed if the package is installed in traditional way # using setup.py or easy_install sys.path.append(os.path.abspath('/path/to/sphinxcontrib.rawfiles')) # Enabled extensions extensions = ['sphinxcontrib.rawfiles'] # Files you want to copy rawfiles = ['CNAME']Repository==========This code is hosted by Bitbucket. http://bitbucket.org/birkenfeld/sphinx-contrib/
